LanguageData.Plant_SSPolyflower.label: Polyflower
LanguageData.Plant_SSPolyflower.description: A genetically modified flower that gives off numerous different scents. It was designed in this way to ensure that a pleasurable response can be had despite olfactory preferences.
LanguageData.SSPolyPetals.label: Polyflower petals
LanguageData.SSPolyPetals.description: Picked petals of the polyflower. These petals can be used for various aromatic purposes.
LanguageData.SSPolyflowerJuice.label: Polyflower Juice
LanguageData.SSPolyflowerJuice.description: A sweet tonic made from polyflowers and glycerol. It helps fulfills the need for recreation.
